description: React component for the course catalog page with server-side pagination, search, wishlist, and cart functionalities, using Supabase as backend.

classes.name: Catalog
classes.description: React functional component for displaying a list of courses with search, pagination, wishlist, and cart actions.

methods.name: Catalog
methods.description: Main React component function implementing course listing with search, pagination, wishlist, and cart functionalities.

methods.name: onSearchSubmit
methods.description: Handles search form submission, resets to first page.

methods.name: onAddToCart
methods.description: Adds selected course to cart and shows success or error toast.

methods.name: toggleWishlist
methods.description: Toggles course wishlist status for the user, updates state, and shows toast.

methods.name: changePage
methods.description: Changes current page, scrolls to top.
